name: php-stan
description: Analyse your php code instantly, and catch errors before they happen.

php-stan.phpVersion.markdownDescription: PHP Version used to run php-stan. The minimum version required is 7.2.0. [Reference](https://phpstan.org/user-guide/getting-started)

php-stan.approach.markdownDescription: Approach used to download and execute php-stan. Currently only phar files are used. Later, support for composer will be added. [Reference](https://phpstan.org/user-guide/getting-started#installation)

php-stan.level.markdownDescription: Level used for analysis (-l). Only values between 0-9 inclusive are allowed. [Reference](https://phpstan.org/user-guide/rule-levels)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
